page.title: 18DIDSBURY AMENITIES
page.content: Our block offers many leisure facilities,most open to the public,with a few private sports clubs.There are many public playing fields for football and rugby and other organised games. If you go to a park in our block you will probably find:bowling greens, tennis courts (grass/shale),children's playgrounds and public playing fields. In one park,apart from the facilities above,is an alpine rock garden with plants,greenhouses,fish ponds and open grass lands. There are also two private golf clubs and various public and private leisure centres. All the facilities are widely used by the local population.
